message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available to other potential buyers. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further. Looking forward to your positive response.
